pages.about: About Us - Coffee Notes Home About Us Catalog Phone: +91-493-7268319 E-mail: coffeenotes@gmail.com About Us Find out how it all started More Detailed Our Company's History Founded in 1895 by coffee enthusiasts John Smith and Emily Brown, Coffee Notes started as a small roastery in the heart of Seattle. Over the years, our passion for sourcing the finest coffee beans from around the world has driven us to expand our operations and perfect our craft. Our Path of Development From our humble beginnings, we've grown into a renowned brand known for our commitment to quality and sustainability. Our journey has seen us establish direct trade relationships with coffee farmers, ensuring fair prices and ethical practices throughout the supply chain. Our Approach to Bean Selection At Coffee Notes, we meticulously select only the highest quality Arabica and Robusta beans from regions like Ethiopia, Colombia, and Brazil. Each batch is carefully roasted to highlight its unique flavor profile, delivering a rich and satisfying coffee experience. Our Values Our core values of quality, integrity, and sustainability guide everything we do. We prioritize environmental stewardship, from sustainable farming practices to eco-friendly packaging solutions. Coffee Notes is committed to making a positive impact on our planet and communities. Our Team Meet the key individuals dedicated to quality and customer service: Our team at Coffee Notes is comprised of passionate individuals who are committed to delivering the highest quality coffee and exceptional customer service. Each member plays a crucial role in ensuring that every cup of coffee we produce meets our exacting standards. John Smith Chief Roaster John has over 15 years of experience in coffee roasting and ensures that every batch is roasted to perfection to bring out the unique flavors of our beans. Emily Brown Customer Service Manager Emily oversees our customer service operations, ensuring that each customer's experience with Coffee Notes is positive and memorable. Michael Johnson Quality Control Specialist Michael meticulously inspects every batch of coffee beans to ensure they meet our rigorous quality standards before they are packaged and shipped to our customers. Our Approach to Bean Selection Discover our criteria for selecting beans, roasting process, and packaging: At Coffee Notes, we take great care in selecting the finest coffee beans from around the world. Our journey begins with sourcing beans from renowned coffee regions like Ethiopia, Colombia, and Brazil. We prioritize beans that are grown sustainably and ethically, ensuring fair trade practices and support for local farmers. Once the beans arrive at our roastery, our expert roasters meticulously craft each batch to highlight its unique flavor profile. We utilize state-of-the-art roasting techniques to achieve the perfect balance of aroma, acidity, and body in every cup of coffee. After roasting, our beans are promptly packaged using eco-friendly materials to preserve freshness and flavor. We believe in sustainable packaging solutions that minimize our environmental footprint while ensuring that our coffee reaches you in optimal condition. Place an Order To place an order, please fill out the form below: I accept Privacy policy Submit Order Home About Us Catalog Phone: +91-493-7268319 E-mail: coffeenotes@gmail.com Adress: 1st Block,Jayanagar East, Hombegoda Nagar, Bangalore, Karnataka, India Privacy policy Terms and Conditions

Make an Order Costa Rican Tarrazu Smooth and crisp Costa Rican beans with a bright acidity and floral aroma. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Coffee Notes Home About Us Catalog Phone: +91-493-7268319 E-mail: coffeenotes@gmail.com Privacy Policy Welcome to Coffee Notes' Privacy Policy. This document outlines how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or interact with us. Information We Collect We may collect various types of personal information when you interact with Coffee Notes. This includes: Your name, email address, phone number, and shipping address when you place an order. Information you provide when you subscribe to our newsletter or participate in surveys or promotions. Details of your interactions with our website, such as browsing history, cookies, and IP address. We collect this information to process your orders, improve our products and services, and personalize your experience with Coffee Notes. How We Use Your Information Your personal information is used for the following purposes: To process and fulfill your orders, including payment processing and shipping. To communicate with you about your orders, promotions, and new products. To improve our website functionality, customer service, and overall customer experience. To personalize your experience by showing content and advertisements tailored to your interests. Sharing Your Information We respect your privacy and do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy or as required by law. We may share your information with: Service providers who help us operate our business, such as payment processors and shipping companies. Third-party partners who assist in marketing and promotional activities. Legal authorities if we believe that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, comply with legal obligations, or prevent fraud. Security of Your Information Coffee Notes implements robust security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. We use industry-standard encryption protocols and secure server infrastructure to safeguard your data. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Changes to This Privacy Policy Coffee Notes may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this policy regularly for any updates. Contact Us If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at coffeenotes@gmail.com. Thank you for trusting Coffee Notes with your personal information. We are committed to maintaining your privacy and providing you with a secure online experience. Home About Us Catalog Phone: +91-493-7268319 E-mail: coffeenotes@gmail.com Adress: 1st Block,Jayanagar East, Hombegoda Nagar, Bangalore, Karnataka, India Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
